properties.description: We're a grassroots FA standard football club, catering to children of all ages, regardless of ability or background. Part of our commitment to fostering community spirit in football, the committee has once again decided to open our Pavilion to the people of Barwell and surrounding areas. Please join us for free hot drinks and biscuits, a warm welcome and smile also thrown in, though never over the shoulder. Football puns appreciated, but may go over the head. There's a local park to enjoy, free parking, accessible toilets, free WiFi and a small selection of books to read. Free books welcome, exchanges on books also accepted for the Readers scheme.
